resources.string: Changelog
Get started
Skip
Welcome to ScenePeek
A free and open-source client for TMDB & Jellyseerr
What\'s new in %s for %s
TMDB
Connect your TMDB account to access your watchlist, ratings, lists and more.
Jellyseerr
Connect to your Jellyseerr instance to request movies and TV shows instantly.
IMDb & TMDB Link Handling
ScenePeek can open URLs from IMDb & TMDB in the app. This can be useful for opening links to movies, TV shows and people directly in the app.
- TMDB Lists: Create and edit custom lists, add movies and TV shows
- Watchlist tab has been renamed to Profile, now includes watchlist, lists, and ratings
- Update encryption library that caused app to crash on re-install.\n\nIf you were connected to either TMDB or Jellyseerr you have been signed out. You can re-login to either services
- Fix TMDB\'s issue causing submit movie/tv-show rating, add to watchlist and add to list to fail
- Add loading indication when adding to watchlist and submitting rating
- Display all unread changelogs on app update
- [Jellyseerr] Add login support for Emby
- Redesign and simplify UI for movie and tv show cards
- Redesign the login screen for Jellyseerr
- Add action menu for movies and TV shows. You can now long press on any movie/TV show to easily share, add to list, and mark as favorite
- Favorite status is now visible across all media cards
